com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface SupportBundleLogger

public interface SupportBundleLogger

A logger specifically designed for the support bundle. This will bypass the regular log mechanism and is intended to work in low memory situations or when the standard logging code may not be functional.

A logger is only valid for the lifetime of the method is was passed to and must not, under any circumstances, be cached.

The logging for a support bundle is not internationalized.

Since:
5.6.10
